instruction: Set up a basic Phaser project with necessary files (GameScene.js, Player.js).
Create a Player sprite in Player.js with initial properties (e.g., position, speed).
Load the Player sprite and any necessary assets (e.g., ship image) in the GameScene's preload function.
expected_outcome: Assets loaded and ready to use.

instruction: Create an instance of the Player sprite in the GameScene's create function and add it to the scene.
expected_outcome: Player sprite visible on the screen.

instruction: Implement WASD input handling in the GameScene's update function to move the Player sprite.
expected_outcome: Player sprite moves according to WASD keys pressed.
